zarEh_ct__12zck9cplmYw.text: Really standard diner food. Their grits are amazing. So creamy and delicious. The waiter gossiped to us about past clientele which I thought was a bit off color. I really enjoy the food and it's located in the EpiCenter, so it's very convenient.

KTfpAAzFmRHFshayGm3lIQ.text: This place was recommended to us by our hotel staff after they first recommended Buffalo Wild Wings and we let them know we could get that at home.  We ordered four different dishes so we could share and sample. Everything was great. This is the FIRST place outside of home that has really good biscuits and gravy.  The shrimp and grits was excellent as was the fried chicken. I really don't understand their rating not being a little higher.

lDp9neCgYSDshmd0gjMeUw.text: The previous reviews red the waitress standing around, while customer, waiting to be seated in a near empty diner, are TRUE. Not only that, as soon as I was seated, Andrea, my server asked if I knew what I would like. No, it's my first and last. I asked for water with lime, I got water with lemon. She came back at least 2x asking if I had decided. Finally, I chose BLT and "Homemade Onion Rings" with secret sauce.  From my point of view, these were the thinnest slices of onion with hardly any breading, instead of being wonderful slice of heaven, they were hard, chewy. Took only 1 bite of one. Put it back, The portion sandwich was ok, thankfully it wasn't on large bread. It was served in two halves, lots of lettuce, nice slice tomatoes and thick bacon.

XUXeWEBgFnHscl9e9fIN8Q.text: The food is okay if you're looking for late night eats after a night out on the town. But you could get the same from another diner with better customer service. Tonight, my friends and I were harassed by an overzealous security guard, even though he received no prompting from Mgmt to act in such a manner. In fact, mgmt was on our side, but the guy was still power tripping off a badge, and was extremely disrespectful. I made a formal complaint, but am unsure if much will be done in regards to this manner. If you want to patron an establishment that supports a security team that treats its customers like criminals, this is the place for you.

uGmlaRxrwCjeK_od3ITllg.text: The place is pretty average. It's built to look like an old school diner. It's a slight step up from a Steak and Shake. The service was great but the food was average. If you're visiting Charlotte find somewhere else. If you're really hungry it's an average place that'll meet your needs.

7s7QrYb1HKU_DZ95J8r_9Q.text: The Red Eye Diner is a near miss. I have eaten there 3 times in 2 weeks and each time the service was poor. The wait staff wears  scarfs, that hang into the food (in prep and in service). The cooks in the kitchen can't tell a hamburger from a turkey burger. The food is at best is just average. The desert prices are ridiculous for a diner environment. A small slice of cake is over $6 and they don't have basic apple or cherry pie.

ccU0czaV101FeLpzQIcvTQ.text: Waffle is awful dry can't even swallow.  The eggs didn't have enough cheese.  Turkey sandwich on plain white toast. Gross. Bummer.  Not enough staff.

q0LCNQc4GlHlfOfVHepKpg.text: Good food served hot and fast. We were a party of 4 and were seated quickly. Fried chicken like Momma's. Shrimp and grits are tasty but a bit spicy. Shrimp tacos were good. The chicken noodle soup was very good with large pieces of chicken in it. Overall definitely a good place for homestyle food. We will definitely be back when we are in the area.

gTZWPTgCRHAdHhVHkbBXyg.text: I love that you can get breakfast all day here.  So far it is the only place in Uptown open at lunch that does this.  The service was excellent with Sherrod and I love the atmosphere.  There are a ton of options and although I've only tried a few dishes so far, I have liked each one.  For Uptown, the prices are very reasonable especially considering the amount of food you get.

b29OxmE1JL5Cju3Vk8QNvw.text: Stopped in briefly at the recommendation of some colleagues. Lindsey and Fab provided top of the line service. We would go back just for the pleasure of interacting with them again. I cannot stress enough that this is was one of the best customer service experiences that I've ever had. 5 Stars with no hesitation. Give these two a raise!!!!

aeIXrniWnSiqkVd9MBYLGQ.text: This is the worst place to ever eat at ! Especially after hours . They literally choose and pick people to get inside . And the SECURITY guards are so disrespectful.. The worst customer service I've ever received in life . Didn't even eat here .. They said wait was 15-20mins , but let people who were way behind us in before us . Just doesn't make sense. I would recommend NOT TO COME Here AT NIGHT. They don't even deserve 1 star . ZERO STARS if you ask me ... Red eye sucks . Better off going home to make your own breakfast .

5XVvQ1Jdfjwu4TVNLnuVCw.text: Well the 'diner' appeal aesthetically is pretty much the only thing this place has going for it. We went on a Thursday night and there wasn't a long wait at all. Our server came over promptly and brought waters but after that she got really, really slack with her job. Her name tag says she was the shift manager and I'm not entirely sure how she actually got that position, because she certainly is not a pillar of management I would look up to. The food was less than stellar and, at best, just edible. I got the spaghetti with meat sauce and you could tell it was definitely straight out of the jar or can. Got to pick on pie for dessert and it was OK, but again, less than stellar. Basically, if you want great service and a really great tasting meal, don't go to this place. It's terrible and I will not be back. There are many more better options in the Epicentre.

JPMfT4rXfg-7HLajyRT9TA.text: Food was decent but the service was horrible. Appetizer came after the entrees were served. People's drinks were not kept refilled. The waitress cleared our table after we sat there with empty plates for at least 10 minutes, then disappeared and didn't bring us the check. We had to flag her down to get the check. We won't be back.

VkN9kaEH32y3vCGuK775Eg.text: The best fried chicken in Charlotte!  The burgers are excellent as well. Great flavor and their fries are hand cut and whatever they are seasoned with makes them even better. Everything I've had here has been outstanding. They hand bread their chicken tenders and you can tell. I don't use sauce when I eat chicken tenders so I normally have to add salt and pepper but it's not needed. It was tender and juicy with plenty of flavor. The firecracker chicken sandwich taste like orange or sesame (minus the sesame seeds) chicken but on a bun. Even the spaghetti was awesome. It's meaty and not tomato tasting. Definitely homemade.

sLFxFOXEQT82iWv80aY0ng.text: Can't review the food because we never were seated.  My husband and I are in town for the Belk Bowl and this place was next to our hotel.  We got in around 11 pm and not many places were still serving food so we walked over to the Redeye Diner. There was a sign that said wait to be seated so we stood there about 10-15 min without anyone acknowledging our presence. Finally got fed up and left. Went to the bar at the hotel and had more luck ordering from a limited menu.  We're here for another night but we're definitely not going back.

pnuQmFsJEZShwsOTtdh6Cg.text: Love this place. Went 2 days in a row for breakfast and have been here numerous times. Th wait staff is excellent as are the hostesses. The mgr stopped by our table to check on us-Shelly is super!  Love love love the food. Would go there for every meal if I could. Not sure why so many negative reviews. This is hands down one of my fav places to eat.

Qj3qnF3XX33ndhcz5F0hJw.text: I loved this place!  Kamiya was an amazing waitress.  Very kind and helpful.  Always pleasant and accommodating.  Actually one of the best waitresses I've ever had.  Thank you so much for a wonderful breakfast!!

EoEHPt09arimzcq54qSf5w.text: We enjoyed our time at the Redeye Diner #CamronSorey was a great server and very polite while serving us. My wife and I highly recommended Cam'ron to be your server if you ever go to this restaurant ask for him he will make sure you are well taken care of and give you the best service you'll love.

yeLMtEQomVEvohEMf3l7cg.text: I love the inside look of this restaurant, and the food was delicious. I ordered waffles, bacon, and hash browns.  The service was fast. The servers were very kind and attentive. I would recommend this place to anyone!

tGKvyqt3-RFC6vIzgvPjgA.text: Stopped for breakfast. Sat at the breakfast bar (party of one).  My server was prompt and nice as she could be.  Had the meatlover's omelette.  Nice and fluffy but the ham was a little chewy. The omelette and cup of coffee were $15 and change. So a little pricey but probably in line with everything "uptown".

B5Gm_3o83k8SFMdubBffOA.text: Over flowed toilet at 9 am. FlY in the world of restaurants, the bathroom is the easiest things to clean. If the bathroom is dirty, then imagine how dirty the kitchen is.  Breakfast is the easiest thing to make. Asked for naked toast, got butter saturated bread. Waited 20 minutes, still no naked toast.  Let's see, put bread on hot griddle or toaster, one minute latter naked toast.   Owner and manager, someone in the kitchen is not understanding English or knows how to make simple breakfast. There are a lot of people counting on the place to stay open for their livelihoods.  Didn't give one star because the waitress tied and was very nice. Will give another chance one day, hope things get better.

mLx_6q0TSf_3y_QJUoipUQ.text: Fast, clean, friendly.  What more do you want in a diner?   The eggs were excellent.  This place has it together.  Kudos to them for adhering to an all to rare standard in diners.  Will be back!

hLoEMBg3jEcBZeLWFShPsg.text: Breakfast was good not great, it took a long time for our food to arrive but our waitress was very attentive so it made up for what she could not control and gave this establishment the extra star for service.

-VXwdfbvnJONdpj_Wl1iTQ.text: Great 24hr diner! Came for Sunday morning breakfast!! Everything was great!! Coconut crusted French toast was a winner!! Service was attentive without being obnoxious. Food was tasty. Will come back!!

fbqJ14jHwJWxpvhRJnmvzA.text: Clean and inviting. Menu has a lot of choices. The waiter was extremely friendly and attentive. The food was delicious and the prices are reasonable. I ordered the steak and eggs with hashbrowns and rye toast. I would definitely come back!

ua060rC4yJ1P0hjzg2KYCQ.text: The food is great here and so is the service. Patrick was our server and he made sure our order was perfect and frequently checked on us to make sure we didn't need anything. I will definitely eat here when I visit Charlotte again!

3xZxdBy6FGqOfCHMCFHkcQ.text: My wife and I decided to eat here our first night we were in Charlotte for our anniversary. We were greeted as soon as we walked in the the place was bright and clean. We were seated and promptly greeted by our sever who had a trainee shadowing him. Both of them were pleasant and accommodating during our visit. The drinks came out first, followed by the appetizers (onion rings) we ordered and then the main meal.  I ordered the All American steak burger w/ fries and my wife ordered the chicken tenders. The timing of the meal after the appetizer was the best I've ever seen and the food was hot and delicious. I would definitely go back and recommend this place.

nAK-Ajhv6aQElLchFvRuVg.text: Nice place, nicer people. Food was on point! I'm vegetarian and found a couple of good options. Went back the next night again.

sxENp8M0QS0QSkK0drBhxA.text: Good service.  Okay food. A little over priced, which is not surprising given the location in the Epicentre. A fair amount of grease in the hashbrowns. My scrambled eggs were a bit dry.  My wife's omelet was pretty good.

vKG6fjfUTptrM0Bf2n8rDA.text: I come after enjoying nights out with my friends. If you're every clubbing or bar hopping in the epicenter this is an amazing way to end your night. The staff is so friendly and the food is always amazing! I also love the cool retro diner look that it has in there it's so cool. Also, even if you didn't go out clubbing but you had a taste for some amazing Mac and cheese or chicken and waffles at 2 am that's fine because their open 24 hours which is another amazing perk about this restaurant. 10/10 would recommend!

Ay07WvAFvVesHo0NJUb0_g.text: So i love this restaurant, I usually go in after a night on the town. This particular time i went early on a Wednesday morning to get my favorite dish... shrimp and grits ! Service is regularly competent, but on this Wednesday morning, i was fortunate enough to be taken care of by a charming young server, Braxton.  He brought me my favorite dish but unfortunately it was served under temp. I simply told him what was wrong and he shortly came back with a delicious hot bowl of shrimp and grits. He was very genuine with ensuring that i enjoyed everything. And held great conversation. I will definitely be coming back, and ask for his service;)

Xk-7z8zsg8wyo5zrpb9VUw.text: You can get by with the food. John waited on us and did an outstanding job. The burger was good but not great. There are far worse places to eat in the Epicenter.

EUmykrdkt6p2D_KchrQH1Q.text: This was my first experience at this restaurant and it was absolutely amazing! I ordered French toast eggs grits and bacon and the grits reminded you of the shrimp and grits. Our server was very prompt and courteous and our food came out relatively fast. This location offered a 10% discount if you checked in via yelp, however we forgot to use the discount, lol The food came out hot. The eggs could've been a little better in my opinion, as it tasted more like liquid eggs. Nevertheless it was a great experience and I would go back again.

r1kB_one2NzrJ28AvW9FQQ.text: My go to late night spot! love that it has the same menu as midnight diner, as Midnight is usually a little bit more packed. This place has a great ambiance of a classic 50's diner. Even on packed Saturday night they usually seat my group pretty quickly. Service sometimes is a hit or miss, pray for a friendly and attentive waiter. Instead of chicken and waffles', I usually get buffalo chicken and French toast. It is EVERYTHING! They always make it perfect every time. I have to have anybody really have a disappointing meal here, they usually do it right.

d_1zMiOEg5FfUdcO-TdFbA.text: We happened upon this place while attending a volleyball tournament today in uptown Charlotte! The food to me was so so! I had a chicken salad sandwich which tasted pretty good for the amount was not overwhelming! Very little chicken salad on the sandwiches! Wings were very small! However our service was beyond outstanding! Our waitress Keyajah was fantastic! Although the food was just ok , if I am in the epicenter again I will revisit Redeye and ask for her to be my waitress! Hats off to Keyajah! I recommend anyone eating here to ask for her!

GvJ43mWX5R9bUPUM_ngmBw.text: Meh. Guess it depends what you order. I had corned beef hash which was straight out of the can. Couple of eggs, wheat toast. Filled the stomach before we spent the day in the city. Service was good, bathroom was clean although it was only 10:30 am. Good music though and pretty clean. Maybe it's better at 2 am after a few drinks.

DWFYVGga6A4HQHHxC0i0YA.text: My wife and I have come here for breakfast, lunch, dinner and late night. This diner stays open 24hrs a day and while having sticky tables and slow servers at times it is consistently cheap, open, and tastes ok. This is not a place to go if you are a complainer about little things. The servers are alway super nice but it's hard to get ahold of them after you order and get your food. I've never had a table that didn't have some syrup on it somewhere lol, but yet I go back time and time again because the food is good and this spot is open all the time. Go here but understand this is a classic hole in the wall type of situation. Because this review is so conflicted I will plainly say that yes I like this place.

MRvrQU9vyMx9hpyZIoHHpw.text: This was an AMAZING restaurant! If you are looking for Chicken and Waffles or any type of comfort food, this place has it! gKXm0cwTlz0p_6IeJqkF6Q.text: Do not eat here. After visiting .. three weeks later I found my debit card had been copied by an employee/management and charged six times one ending in a $400 transaction. Management was unapologetic and denied all claims taking no responsibility

HgZ73e3V68SL-uXubAl0BA.text: I have been here twice and the food and service have been great! We were seated quickly and our food came fast. The prices are super affordable and you WILL leave full. It is very similar to Midnight Diner when it comes to the theme and menu. I believe the owners are the same. Red Eye has young, hip feel to it and it doesn't seem as crowded as Midnight Diner. Our food was cooked perfectly. Great place to head to before entertainment at the Epicenter.

We3OaG-3qwG0UDjW7GcwaA.text: It's pretty predictable. The best part of a drinking night is the eating that follows. Also, the worst part of a drinking night is the eating that follows.   Well, we came here for some drunk food, and we ordered different things. From omelettes, biscuits, pancakes and hamburgers.  - Good food - considering! - Good service.  - Good prices.  Three Yelps

KnQ8nEBe8ofqIoASMBt3Uw.text: The burger not being frozen was the only good thing to say. I was on hold for a long time placing my order & when my sister picked up my food she said it looked like it was sitting for a while. My food was cold when I received it & the restaurant was only 0 .8 mile drive up from my hotel.

C3vjrB5aTBuUuu6_DU9-1A.text: Patrick was our waiter this morning for breakfast.  He was very nice, on the ball guy, very polite and very focused person.    He is a great asset to the Redeye Diner. Food was great.  Lots of options.

cMSSy70rxf3-k9UVs-aLTw.text: Red Eye Diner has it all! It's affordable. Ithas great food. It has great staff. And it is in a great location!  Great Location: The Epicentre in Charlotte, NC is walking distance from the Transportation Center so it can be reached without a car.  Great Staff: From management to support staff I cannot bestow high enough accolades!  The manager on duty Saturday was a joy to behold! Bravo Ms. Shakia Chambers! Bravo!  I watched her while she directed her staff and was not afraid to be seen pushing a cart full of dirty dishes. I observed Ms. Chambers perform each task with a calm, cool, and collected dignity. She had it together so her staff kept it together!  Ms. Mecca was in the process of seating 20+ hungry diners when my mother and I arrived late Saterday afternoon.   We were seated right by the door and I was able to observe the would be chaos become calm and organized!  It was a hot Saturday afternoon and I enjoyed watching this well run establishment create order out of the seeming chaos!  I watched as Ms. Mecca remained calm and cool although a man repeatedly came up to her with an aggressive tone of voice. I could clearly see and hear that he was upset yet I NEVER heard or witnessed Ms. Mecca retort in any fashion other with the height of professionalism!  After watching in amazement for awhile I decided that my dining experience needed to be documented!  Ms. Khadija was our waitress and was AWESOME! She was very attentive. She apologized for our wait. We understood that it was a direct result of our being among the 20+ diners who had all decided to come eat at the same time.  Even if the kitchen was short staffed it was well worth the wait!  Food/Affordable: I saved the BEST for last. The  under $20.00 large bowl of Shrimp & Grits with biscuit was not only filling but delicious! The creamy grits were topped with a perfectly seasoned spicy shrimp and gravy.  There are many things in life today that can go wrong. There are many stressors and reasons for complaint. Whenever you can 'break bread' with your family at a restaurant that can make you feel at home, safe, satisfied and leave happy, suddenly you are strengthened to fight another day!  The world would be a better place if more who worked with the public knew how; or at least attempted to develop such a great mindset that life would be so much better when can agree that "we are all in this together!"  Thank you #RedEyeDiner for giving me this wonderful experience!

6VrywIreoajT86LxSSSvXg.text: Food was tasty! Had the chicken PHILLY cheesesteak. John Smith was our waiter and all was smooth and wonderful

Pcg9qhB1hGAOb4ovvjhL7w.text: Came here after trying to go to Carolina Ale House with two of my friends. A host at the Ale House turned us away and recommended we come here. So glad she did! It was a little after midnight so there was a small wait of about 5-10 minutes. Once we got in, we were seated rather quickly. We sat down and was immediately greeted by our server Ateli. She gave us PHENOMENAL service. She was willing to answer the heaping amount of questions we had and was extremely prompt in getting our drinks and orders in once we finally made a decision. The food was hot and delicious. The drink specials weren't super great considering it was a Friday night. Couldn't really tell there was any alcohol in it. For it to be my first time visiting, I would definitely come back AND ask for Ateli.

kK2Dp9W3sLvzVOCsuCyf0Q.text: The best part of this place is it's open 24 hours. I came here first on a early winter morning and the pancakes were perfect,eversince have been a regular here.Have tried most of the items on the menu but love the hashbrown, pancakes the most. Quality is good and not at all expensive. Do try this place whenever in Charlotte! Highly recommended!

6WowMYHuXVrY_oPex9HVDg.text: We're visiting Charlotte. We ate here last night and are back for lunch. Darrell gave great service and the food is very good!

b-42LRJBZS2ZuduOxfcdmg.text: Always good food for a fair price. We always go before games at Spectrum. The atmosphere is cool. A lot of music memorabilia and has the look of and old dinner. Staff are friendly and service was fast.

rtVsOv8v1KwsKxdcw6Nm_Q.text: Late night meal here after some "festivities".  The place was packed and there was a line.    My order was never brought to the table and eventually our server realized this and went to the kitchen.  She returned without the food and said that the kitchen threw it out because it sat there so long.  She asked me if I still wanted it... no thanks - everyone else was finished eating.  She just turned around and walked off. No apology.

F8hXiD3t7mRds-H0woq-_Q.text: I have frequented the epicenter often for several years, had a great time at the rooftop 210. Friends went to the diner to wait in line and get a table around 2am. Understandably this is a busy time, I asked the doorman if I could sit with my friends and he stated parties are only sat when everyone is there. Understandable. My party had already been sat for 4 of 7 people... I pointed to their table (from standing in line) the door man shrugged then stated "you're not getting in tonight" confused I asked why? "He stated tables are only sat when the entire party are present" which is understandable but my party was seated clearly. I asked if I could join my party at their table which was greeted with "you're not getting in tonight" my entire party ended up leaving because we could not meet. I understand the policy of seating a party once all are present but denying a patron after seating his party when it was clearly expressed more people would join isn't the patrons fault. Allowing someone to join their seated party can't possibly be such a hassle?

nWq7U1LyFTDVnrO42-LuZg.text: If I could leave less than a star I would. Tonight I lost all hope in humanity. There was a homeless guy in front of us and he shows the guy who was sitting everyone that he had enough to buy himself a meal they turned him away and said they had no room they couldn't seat him inside but he could sit outside if needed be but they had a booth for our 4 top that was behind him in line and plenty seats at the bar area. Our seat or those could of easily been his... the guy that was seating people said it was what management tells him to do... good job management this is the first and only time I'll be here.

Hcq1pkutadmTe4K0n-lsiA.text: I had an amazing time. Shakia provides a great customer experience and as a visitor from out of the area I would not hesitate to come back. She is AMAZING!!!!

crk_8vSRCSBuIehj8Dj2PQ.text: Terrible management - late night arrival and restaurant is not crowded. Guest had to stand outside for more than an hour to be told the kitchen is closed? Are you serious? Employees walk in front of customers order food and leave. Security advise us that employees has first choice  for service. My party left and was never served. I would rate no stars if I could. Sad sad sad.... Management has no experience with a 24 hour establishment - employees over customers. Awful !!!!!

QJJAZoPao9lGt2cutX6Anw.text: Miss Patty is freaking awesome!!! We love the atmosphere!!! Obviously, you all don't pay Miss Patty enough!!! Definitely the spot after hours!!!

e_R9zbrvjHbuSO2xmIPFDg.text: I tried so hard to like this place. It's definitely a less-greasy and super delicious duplicate of Midnight Diner but the service is TERRIBLE. I've come here 3 separate times now and each time I've waited over an hour for food. The second time I came, our waitress didn't come back to our table with the check we asked for 3 times for 30 minutes. I just ordered takeout an hour ago to avoid the service (because the food really is good) and when I arrived to pick it up, no one had given the order to the kitchen and, yet again, I waited for my food for 45 minutes.

xXsgaVY8pnDLK3GZXZqWrg.text: Service was horrible.  We were a party of 2 with 8 employees at the front counting money one advised they were all on break.  The very timid manager seated us. But noun until after I stated there are 15 other restaurants in the Epicenter that will not make is wait.  The food was ok.....the manager gave us $1.00 of of our order...... I assured her that I would Yelp this visit.....  WOW!

JOwszFLzyJtWcaMU8-13pg.text: WHAT!!!!!!! This was the best breakfast I have ever had. The biscuits and gravy are so unbelievably amazing. I was just passing through Charlotte on my way back to Florida and decided to grab a lil breakfast before heading out. Having no idea where to go, I just started walking down the st, when I came accross Redeye diner and let me tell you, this was the best breakfast I have ever had, and my wife agrees. You have to try the biscuits and gravy and french toast.

Xg5uYjSKEoSrCqbsB6WJCA.text: First , the decor is everything !!! Authentic Old school diner vibes ! After a great time at a hornets gene my boyfriend and I were beyond hungry but wanted to go somewhere in walking distance for obvious reasons ! We came across Redeye and boy are we happy we did ! We were greeted throughout our visit by the very friendly and knowledgeable Uriah and E. We shared high fives with manger Jordan after the first bite of the most delicious fluffy perfectly toasted French toast in the World!!!! Then the grits !!! Ohhhh myyyyy gahhhhh! The most creamy amazing grits , better than your granny's ! Lol, seriously ! Eat the chicken and French toast today !

oFGeYf_-RCKgxLxu-KIgMQ.text: Good food. Reasonable prices. Good atmosphere. I will be back.  I had night time breakfast and the food came out quick and just as I ordered. The entire staff was cleaning the whole time I was very impressed. Good attention to details.

hOBK-GMpifWr7OftbSkHSA.text: Staff was quick and got my family seated quickly. It had only been open a week, so I couldn't order any alcohol. That's fine, though. My waitress was fun and personable and interacted with my children, which is a plus considering how nerve wracking taking small kids out can be. The food I ordered was great. I had the firecracker shrimp, which I liked a lot. I also ordered a hotdog on a whim, which was good, too. My wife was very happy, which is the only part of this that matters. We'll be back. And maybe when I'm partying in Uptown, I'll drag my friends over for a bite to eat.

-hOIF8BC0qkwgi3Fj-khPA.text: I was enchanted with this restaurant! It was in a group of restaurants that when I went at "late night " the second time was well guarded by a well noticed security guard for the whole area which seemed was not really needed. I had a wonderful "diner " style breakfast, and a great bowl of chicken noodle soup for late night when I was late night hungry. I was alone on business and felt wonderfully safe using Uber on the street to go back. The diner was decorated with platinum records of oldie goldie stars and fantastic food! Please consider this place because the menu has standards and contemporary cuisine and culture to enjoy!

Yhif_9GDF1wAB1Cz5vSLJw.text: Very very Slow. Security wouldn't let my boyfriend out the establishment w/o showing he paid for his meal. He ordered his food (something simple) when an hour had passed and he still didn't recieve his food.. he left the waitress a Tip and attempted to leave. Security got into an argument with him because he didn't have a receipt.. This place is horrible. If you must eat here order to go..it will take about 2 hours for them to make your food.

TKUstlde0NMxfgbDZI-lHQ.text: I really wanted to like the diner because I was so excited to get breakfast during my lunch break.  The pros are the place is nice and the service was pretty fast. I was hoping for food as good as that at the original pancake house. My meal was simple just their tall stack of pancakes with a side of sausage and orange juice. Sadly the pancakes were flat, thin and dense, while the orange juice was watered down.  I won't give up hope and may try again.  But this was my first impression.

__dBNfaQHjXyFAvb0QTwmw.text: I ordered a California burger with a side salad and asked for the sauce to be on the side for my burger. No salad was given to me until after my food was delivered and I had to ask for it. My burger had sauce on it. When I asked for a new burger the shift manager said they usually don't give the option to order a burger with out sauce???? What??? We ended up taking the top bun off my wife's burger and swapping it for the side with sauce of mine...didn't want to deal with the wait of new food and the fact the manager made me feel like it was my fault.. management is horrible.. food was sub par.... will never eat here again.
